  left-icon="volume-o"
  text="在代码阅读过程中人们说脏话的频率是衡量代码质量的唯一标准。"
/>
</template>

.van-notice-bar {
  height: 10vh!important;
  background-color: rgb(238, 239, 240) !important;
}
 .notice-swipe {
    height: 40px;
    line-height: 40px;
  }
</style>
